graph.original_query: Create a modern web application with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that includes responsive design and interactive features

nodes.description: Define the overall structure and theme for the web application including layout, color scheme, and font selections. Create basic HTML structure and CSS for styling.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the basic HTML structure, CSS styling (including color scheme and font selections) for a modern web application. Consider a responsive layout using CSS grid or flexbox. Define placeholders for the header, body, and footer sections. Make sure to use CSS variables for colors and fonts and also add comments to add future updates to the files. Create index.html and style.css. The goal is to establish a consistent theme and design.

nodes.description: Create the header section of the web application, including the logo, navigation menu, and any other relevant elements.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure and CSS theme defined in T001, create the header section of the web application. Include a logo placeholder, a navigation menu, and any other relevant elements such as a search bar or user profile link. Ensure that the header is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes. Create header.html and style the header in style.css.

nodes.description: Develop the main content section (body) of the web application, incorporating relevant text, images, and interactive elements.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure and CSS theme defined in T001, develop the main content section (body) of the web application. Incorporate relevant text, images, and interactive elements such as buttons, forms, or carousels. Ensure that the body is well-structured and visually appealing. Create body.html and style the body in style.css.

nodes.description: Design the footer section of the web application, including copyright information, links to relevant pages, and contact information.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure and CSS theme defined in T001, design the footer section of the web application. Include copyright information, links to relevant pages such as privacy policy and terms of service, and contact information. Ensure that the footer is clean and informative. Create footer.html and style the footer in style.css.

nodes.description: Integrate interactive features into the web application using JavaScript, such as form validation, animations, or dynamic content updates.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure and CSS theme defined in T001, integrate interactive features into the web application using JavaScript. Add form validation to ensure that user input is valid. Incorporate animations to enhance the user experience. Implement dynamic content updates to display real-time information. Use JavaScript to handle all the interactivity. Create script.js and link it in index.html.

nodes.description: Ensure that the web application is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes and devices using CSS media queries.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using the HTML structure and CSS theme defined in T001, ensure that the web application is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes and devices. Implement CSS media queries to adjust the layout, fonts, and images based on the screen size. Test the application on various devices to ensure optimal viewing experience. Make the changes in style.css.

nodes.description: Perform quality assurance (QA) testing to identify and fix any bugs or issues in the web application.
nodes.agent_prompt: Perform quality assurance (QA) testing on the web application created in the previous steps. Identify and fix any bugs or issues related to the layout, functionality, or responsiveness of the application. Test the application on different browsers and devices.

nodes.description: Summarize the project, listing the tasks completed and the final state of the web application.
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the project, listing the tasks completed and the final state of the web application including file names.
